name: Shell Command Execution and Output Retrieval
description: This automation pattern runs a shell command to list the contents of the /etc directory and retrieves the output for further processing or display. It operates fully within a digital environment, utilizing software-based automation tools to execute the shell command and capture the results.
input_requirements: Access to a shell or command line interface on the target system

required_integrations: Run a shell command to list /etc and paste here.

llm_recommended_approach: Implement a Python script that uses subprocess to execute the shell command and retrieve the output. Optionally, use SSH for remote command execution if needed. Ensure logging of all command executions for auditing.
